/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their facades punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. 

Parked cars line the sides of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. They are interspersed with trees, their leaves a vibrant green, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. The sky above is a clear blue, its vast expanse only interrupted by the tops of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing at the edge of the street, looking down at the city below.
